title: Step 1: Register
description: To start using BridgeIT, you need to register. Fill in your details and create an account.

title: Step 2: Create Your Project
description: Once registered, navigate to the 'My Projects' section to create a new project.

title: Step 3: Explore Projects
description: Browse available projects in the 'Explore' section. Use filters to find projects that interest you.

title: Step 4: Send Proposals
description: Select a project you like and submit a proposal to the industry expert for feedback.

title: Step 5: Receive Answers
description: Check your notifications to view responses from industry experts regarding your proposals.
